message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product that's still very useful, even if it's not the best quality. It's a great way to test the market and see how you like the product before committing to a higher-quality one. Plus, it's a great value at $10000!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to test the product. I'll take it at the offered price.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This one is similar, but with some minor improvements. It's still a great value at $10000, and I think you'll be happy with it. Plus, buying two products at once can lead to some bulk discounts in the future, so it's worth considering.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Based on the feedback from the last product, I believe it's best to pass on this one to avoid potential disappointment.

I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product this time! This one is a game-changer, and I think you'll be thrilled with its performance. At $10000, it's a steal, considering the value it brings. I'm confident you won't regret this purchase.

It's still a useful product, but it's not as high-end as the previous one. I'm willing to make a special deal for you, though - I'll give you a slight discount to $9500.
